translation.aboutme2: I am a full stack developer specializing in front-end, with experience in creating interactive and scalable solutions. I focus on developing intuitive, functional, and optimized interfaces for web and mobile, ensuring a great user experience. I have skills in multimedia design, including web design, identity creation, and content for social media. As a self-taught professional, committed to continuous learning, I am dedicated to adopting new technologies and agile methodologies to add value to teams and projects.
